verses.name: Hebrews 9:26
verses.text: For then must he often have suffered since the foundation of the world: but now once in the end of the world hath he appeared to put away sin by the sacrifice of himself.

verses.name: Hebrews 9:27
verses.text: And as it is appointed unto men once to die, but after this the judgment:

verses.name: Hebrews 9:28
verses.text: So Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation.
